title: The Good Fight: Dan Hooker says he'll donate half his purse to Dustin Poirier's foundation if he fights him
text:
Gallery Dan Hooker def. Al Iaquinta at UFC 243: Best photos view 22 images

Dan Hooker may have found a way to lure Dustin Poirier into a fight.

After Poirier, a former interim lightweight champion, rejected his callout, Hooker has offered to donate half of his purse to Poirier’s “Good Fight Foundation” if he fights him in a headlining spot in New Zealand.

@DustinPoirier if you take the fight against me I'll donate half my show money to your charity @TheGoodFightFDN @seanshelby UFC Auckland Main Event! 👊👊👊 — Dan Hangman Hooker (@danthehangman) October 11, 2019
description: Dan Hooker tries to lure Dustin Poirier into a fight by offering to donate half of his purse to Poirier's "Good Fight Foundation."
